channel.title: SpamNeo- My script
channel.description:
Hi, this is my script, SpamNeo.
There's not much use to it, but it will spam for you =)
I don't seem able to make it repeat itself, so feel free to mess with it.
Please comment if you use it :D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 08:19:35 PM[/size][hr]Someone downloaded it!!!
Now post it here? P- p- p- please?

item.title: SpamNeo- My script
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

[code]//////////////////Inscructions//////////////////
// //
// 1. Click on a thread on the Neopets forums.//
// 2. Either spam one post yourself, or type- //
// ‘#bottom’ at the end of the URL. //
// 3. Target the tread window, click out and- //
// press ctrl+alt+r, to run. You will have- //
// five seconds. //
// //
// I seem unable to get this thing to repeat- //
// So feel free to play with it =) //
////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
procedure NeoSpam;
begin;
repeat;
Wait(5000) // This gives you five seconds to click out
Clickmouse(400, 100, True);
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys(‘This is spam. ‘);
Clickmouse(440, 255, True);
Writeln(’-Spammed-’);
until(false);
end;[/code]

Won’t work.

[code]//////////////////Inscructions//////////////////
// //
// 1. Click on a thread on the Neopets forums.//
// 2. Either spam one post yourself, or type- //
// ‘#bottom’ at the end of the URL. //
// 3. Target the tread window, click out and- //
// press ctrl+alt+r, to run. You will have- //
// five seconds. //
// //
// I seem unable to get this thing to repeat- //
// So feel free to play with it =) //
////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
procedure NeoSpam;
begin;
Clickmouse(400, 100, True);
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys(‘This is spam. ‘);
Clickmouse(440, 255, True);
end;
begin
repeat;
NeoSpam;
Wait(5000) // This gives you five seconds to click out
Writeln(’-Spammed-’);
until(IsFKeyDown(4));
end.[/code]

THIS will

Read full topic

////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
procedure NeoSpam;
begin;
repeat;
Wait(5000) // This gives you five seconds to click out
Clickmouse(400, 100, True);
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys(‘This is spam. ‘);
Clickmouse(440, 255, True);
Writeln(’-Spammed-’);
until(false);

item.title: SpamNeo- My script
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

stares dumbfounded THAT’S all I needed to do?

Ty =)[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 11:48:45 PM[/size][hr]Doesn’t seem to be working… Says I’m missing a simicolon[br][size=1]Posted at: December 21, 2006, 11:52:27 PM[/size][hr]//////////////////Inscructions//////////////////
// //
// 1. Click on a thread on the Neopets forums.//
// 2. Either spam one post yourself, or type- //
// ‘#bottom’ at the end of the URL. //
// 3. Target the tread window, click out and- //
// press ctrl+alt+r, to run. You will have- //
// five seconds. //
// //
// I seem unable to get this thing to repeat- //
// So feel free to play with it =) //
////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
procedure NeoSpam;
begin
repeat
Wait(5000) // This gives you five seconds to click out
Clickmouse(400, 100, True);
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys(‘This is spam. ‘);
Clickmouse(440, 255, True);
Writeln(’-Spammed-’)
until(false)
end;

begin
NeoSpam;
end.

====

That seemed to work for me. Just press Ctrl+Alt+S.

Read full topic

item.title: SpamNeo- My script
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

If it is all right, I will paste the code for all non-downloaders. I have also edited it so that it will do it over and over and over until you press f4. Enjoy!

[scar]
//////////////////Inscructions//////////////////
// //
// 1. Click on a thread on the Neopets forums.//
// 2. Either spam one post yourself, or type- //
// ‘#bottom’ at the end of the URL. //
// 3. Target the tread window, click out and- //
// press ctrl+alt+r, to run. You will have- //
// five seconds. //
// //
// I seem unable to get this thing to repeat- //
// So feel free to play with it =) //
////////////////////////////////////////////////

program New;
begin
Wait(5000) // This gives you five seconds to click out
repeat
Clickmouse(400, 100, True);
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys('This is spam. ');
SendKeys(‘This is spam. ‘);
Clickmouse(440, 255, True);
Writeln(’-Spammed-’)
until (isfkeydown(4))
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
